# allAsleepValues

**Type Property**

A set of values that represents the possible stages of sleep.

## Declaration

```swift
static var allAsleepValues: Set<HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis> { get }
```

## Discussion

This value includes [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis/asleep], [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis/asleepCore], [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis/asleepDeep], [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis/asleepREM], and [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis/asleepUnspecified].
title: allAsleepValues
